seo_agent_results.generated_article_body_md:
## DOGE Assigns College Student to Rewrite HUD Regulations Using AI  

A DOGE operative has been tasked with leveraging AI to propose rewrites for the Department of Housing and Urban Development’s (HUD) regulations. This initiative marks a pilot effort that could expand across government agencies, highlighting the growing role of AI in regulation.  

Sources indicate the project aims to streamline bureaucratic processes while maintaining compliance. The move reflects a broader trend of integrating AI into regulatory frameworks to improve efficiency.
